inscription: Inscribed on first page, perhaps by author (indecipherable), with location and date: Marseille, le 12 janvier 1979.
markings: Numbered in pencil on colophon page: 28
medium: Letterpress with woodcuts in black and gray
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis
title: La Parole Odyssee
